item.description:
Thanksgiving Eve is a major party night, the entire downtown will be alive, and I love to dance, so come out dancing with us at Wicked Wolf!  Or just drink & stare.

We'll meet at 9pm, hang-out, and at some point get dancing.

If there's a cover, give them my name at the door (Jason Kulas), it'll be reduced price.  Also $3 drink specials 9-11pm on draft beers, well/call drinks, & house wines (you'll have to get a bracelet from me).

If you're a "Maybe", please note that in your RSVP

If people want to meet before for dinner, speak up, maybe we'll plan something.

The music at Wicked Wolf is often like what you'd hear on 101.3FM

HOW TO FIND US: We'll probably hang-out in the front section first. If you're coming later, text me before you arrive so there's time for me to notice your text. I probably have a bad signal in the back.  If it helps, I'm tall (6'3").

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (noisy club, texting probably best)

PARKING: I always find free street parking easily northeast of the green...Temple St, Grove St, etc. Or look at New Haven's out-dated parking garage map here
http://www.cityofnewhaven.com/ParkingAuthor...
item.name: Wed 11/23 - Thanksgiving Eve drinkin', dancin', whatever!
